name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel II
summary:
The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel II is a Japanese role-playing game and the sequel to The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel.

"The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel II picks up one month after the decisive collision that changed the fate of the entire nation of Erebonia. The speedy, tactical turn-based combat with the newly-developed “ARCUS” system returns, with all the bells and whistles players fondly remember, along with the new Overdrive mode, new means of transportation both across the land and sky, new allies, new dangers, and a renewed sense of hope as Rean tirelessly works to right the wrongs that have led the country to disarray."

esrb.synopsis: This is a role-playing game in which players assume the role of students caught within a civil war. As players explore various dungeons, they use swords, bows, spears, and magic spells to defeat fantastical creatures (e.g., slime drones, mechanized armor, large insects) and enemy soldiers in turn-based combat. Realistic gunfire and large explosions accompany the battle sequences. Cutscenes contain additional acts of violence and depictions of blood: an unconscious man lying in a large pool of blood; a man bleeding from a puncture wound in his chest; a man dying in a large explosion. The game contains some suggestive material: female characters in revealing outfits that expose partial buttocks; dialogue that references breast size (e.g., “Yeah, your boobies are pretty big already” and “How'd you even luck out with boobs that big?”). Players occasionally encounter characters who smoke cigarettes and consume alcohol. The words “sh*t” and “a*shole” are heard in the dialogue.
